title: as it relates to Articles 6(1)(a), (1)(b), (1)(d) and (2)(i) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Industrial Commodities
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Industrial Commodities 

Production Survey) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 28 February 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (industrial commodity production survey) order 2022 (2) order come operation 28 february 2022

title: as it relates to Articles 6(1)(a), (1)(b), (1)(d) and (2)(i) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“net selling value” means, in relation to a commodity or service that is sold by a 
person or undertaking, the amount received by the person or undertaking in 
respect of such sale, less VAT (or equivalent); 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“relevant period” means the period from 28 February 2022 to 31 December 
2026; 

“survey” means the Industrial Commodities Production Survey conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purpose of obtaining information set out in the 
Schedule, including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation; 

“VAT” means value-added tax. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - net selling value mean relation commodity service sold person undertaking amount received person undertaking respect sale le vat (or equivalent) regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 relevant period mean period 28 february 2022 31 december 2026 survey mean industrial commodity production survey conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information set schedule including purpose compliance regulation vat mean value-added tax (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking that –
text_raw:

(a)

title: as it relates to Articles 6(1)(a), (1)(b), (1)(d) and (2)(i) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies to
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies to 
provide, annually in the relevant period and for the purposes of the survey, 
information in relation to the preceding year, the general nature of which is 
specified in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies provide annually relevant period purpose survey information relation preceding year general nature specified schedule hereby prescribed

title: as it relates to Articles 6(1)(a), (1)(b), (1)(d) and (2)(i) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 5. The Statistics (Industrial Commodities Production Survey) Order 2017
text_raw:
5. The Statistics (Industrial Commodities Production Survey) Order 2017 

(S.I. No. 496 of 2017) is revoked.

title: as it relates to Articles 6(1)(a), (1)(b), (1)(d) and (2)(i) thereof, hereby order as
heading: 12. Whether the amounts provided by the person or undertaking under –
text_raw:
12. Whether the amounts provided by the person or undertaking under – 

(a) paragraphs 6, 7, 10 and 11, and 

(b) paragraphs 8 and 9, 

are expressed in euro, and, if not expressed in euro, the currency in which they 
are expressed. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

23 February, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
